description.format_msg: It is a brief description of the rule

from.format_msg: It is the source address IP or the source networking net that will be routed to the table

not.format_msg: It is the not logical operator. It is used with the from parameter to negate its result

priority.format_msg: It is the priority which the rule will be executed. Minor value of priority is going to be executed before

table.format_msg: It is the tabled used to route the packet if it matches with the parameter: from
